vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'H1719B', 'matchingForm': 'רֹדָן', 'stepTransliteration': 'ro.dan', 'gloss': 'Dedan', '_searchResultRange': 'Gen.10.7-1Chr.1.9', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '底但', '_es_Gloss': 'Dedán', '_zh_Gloss': '底但'}, {'strongNumber': 'H1719C', 'matchingForm': 'רֹדָן', 'stepTransliteration': 'ro.dan', 'gloss': 'Dedan', '_searchResultRange': 'Gen.25.3-1Chr.1.32', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '底但', '_es_Gloss': 'Dedán', '_zh_Gloss': '底但'}, {'strongNumber': 'H1720', 'matchingForm': 'דְּדָנִי', 'stepTransliteration': 'de.da.ni', 'gloss': 'Dedanite', '_searchResultRange': 'Isa.21.13@Isa.21.13-Ezek.38.13', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '底但', '_es_Gloss': 'Dedanim', '_zh_Gloss': '底但'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Also named: de.da.nim (דְּדָנִי "Dedanite" H1720)
§ Dedan = "low country"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) the son of Raamah and grandson of Cush. A son of Jokshan and grandson of Keturah
n pr loc
2) a place in south Arabia
vocabinfos._es_Definition: hijo de Raamá, Jocsán; descendiente de Sem, Cam
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
底但 这个字在原文的意思是 "低地"
陽性專有名詞
1) 拉瑪的兒子, 古實的孫子 ( #創 10:7| ). 約珊的兒子, 基土拉的孫子 ( #創 25:3| )
專有名詞 地名
2) 在南阿拉伯的一個地名
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
底但 这个字在原文的意思是 "低地"
阳性专有名词
1) 拉玛的儿子, 古实的孙子 ( #创 10:7| ). 约珊的儿子, 基土拉的孙子 ( #创 25:3| )
专有名词 地名
2) 在南阿拉伯的一个地名

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Cushites living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.7;
son of: Raamah (H7484);
brother of: Sheba (H7614)
§ Dedan = "low country"
n pr loc
Rhodes (or Rhodians)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: descendientes de Javán, hijo de Jafet

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.25.3;
son of: Jokshan (H3370);
brother of: Sheba (H7614I);
father of: Asshurim (H0805A), Letushim (H3912) and Leummim (H3817)
§ Dedan = "low country"
Male living at the time of the first Patriarchs (Gen.25.3a; Gen.25.3b; 1Ch.1.32)
